lunch_box.description:
A custom made lunch box packed with plenty of care.
Until a spell is developed to both eat this and still have it, it'll be gone after you eat it for lunch.
lunch_box.name: Deluxe Lunch Box

milk.description:
A carton of milk every day helps you grow taller.
Expires monthly, so it's best to buy this at the start of the month.
milk.name: Milk Subscription (Monthly)

problem_set.description:
A set of problems delivered to your door every single day. Why are you paying money for this?
Expires monthly, so it's best to buy this at the start of the month.
problem_set.name: Practice Problems Subscription (Monthly)

problem_set_2.description:
Volume 2 of the 'Practice Problems' monthly subscription. Now with even more stress!
Expires monthly, so it's best to buy this at the start of the month.
problem_set_2.name: Practice Problems Vol. 2 Subscription (Monthly)

apprentice_robes.description: Well crafted robes suitable for an apprentice. Seems to carry a hint of her majesty's personal taste.
apprentice_robes.name: Apprentice Robes

backup_palette.description: A replacement set of brush and palette just in case you misplace your original set.
backup_palette.name: Backup Palette

lucky_clover.description:
A four leaf clover. It's hard to tell if it does anything.
Rice's Appraisal: 'It seems to increase the chances of running into someone when going on walks.'
lucky_clover.name: Lucky Clover

walking_shoes.description: Comfortable shoes for walking, lets you take an extra walk every day.
walking_shoes.name: Walking Shoes

health_potion.description:
A red potion for restoring health.

Combat item.  Consumable.
health_potion.name: Health Potion

mana_potion.description:
A blue potion for restoring mana.

Combat item. Consumable.
mana_potion.name: Mana Potion

overload_potion.description:
An indigo potion which increases all stats when drunk.

Combat item. Consumable.
overload_potion.name: Overload Potion

exit_pass.description:
A pass for entering and exiting the city.
Most people get this by filling out a few forms.
exit_pass.name: Exit Pass

basic_card_pack.description: A random card from a selection of basic cards. You probably won't get anything too special, so don't get your hopes up.
basic_card_pack.name: Basic Card Pack

daily_life_card_pack.description: A card pack with a selection of mostly non-combat spell cards. Not very useful for fighting, but convenient in daily life. There's a small 'v' emblazoned on the back of the packaging.
daily_life_card_pack.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/data01_05.png
daily_life_card_pack.name: Daily Life Card Pack

fireball_card_pack.description: A card pack with mostly mid-tier combat spells. Nothing too special, but you do need a minimum level of mana to even cast some of them.
fireball_card_pack.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/element03_01.png
fireball_card_pack.name: Fireball Card pack

meteor_card_pack.description: A card pack for people who love big explosions. Be careful when you drop meteors on people.
meteor_card_pack.image: res://Art/Mori no oku no kakurezato/Skill Icon/Resized/meteor.png
meteor_card_pack.name: Meteor Card Pack
